entry.def: When a woman menstruates, a flow of blood comes from her womb. Women menstruate once a month unless they are pregnant or have reached the menopause.

example.ex: Lean hard-training women athletes may menstruate less frequently or not at all.
example.tran: 身材瘦削而且训练艰苦的女运动员行经可能不那么频繁，或者根本不来月经。

means.word_mean: 1. the monthly discharge of blood from the uterus of nonpregnant women from puberty to menopause;

sentences.sentence: "the women were sickly and subject to excessive menstruation"
"a woman does not take the gout unless her menses be stopped"--Hippocrates
"the semen begins to appear in males and to be emitted at the same time of life that the catamenia begin to flow in females"--Aristotle
